author: bencomic

right.text: it they foudn out I would never be able to show my face to them again. please don't please! * John_Jr cries and shivers

left.text: if I would have known it was against the law I wouldn't have. and my parents don't know I'm bi

right.text: please don't tell them about the bi thing please! and nothing else. you can tell them about the stealing wifi but that's it

left.text: Listen, you're lucky. Normally I'd call the ISP and get your whole family disconnected.

right.text: john jr, ianj told my parents i was a gay furry :(

left.text: The bi thing is probably the biggest violation.

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 45
